Cherryitems (Unix, OSX) Scrapy Item classes for use in scraping university and publisher websites
CherryPipelines (Unix, OSX) Data processing pipeline to record scrapy items correctly
collect (Unix, OSX) Module for running PickSpider and ShakeSpider
community_generation (Unix, OSX) methods for using gephi to subdivide documents into modularity communities
consume (Unix, OSX) Run a MunchSpider to resolve more metadata from dois with partially resolved metadata from a Crossref Scrape (from a ShakeSpider or PickSpider)
corpus (Unix, OSX) corpus object for use in corpus manipulation
corpus_stats (Unix, OSX) functions for generating statistics on document collections
 
d
dim_reduction (Unix, OSX) reduce dimensions of inputted vectors
docIterators (Unix, OSX) docIterators is a collection of objects used for streaming records from the data source in a memory-friendly way
 
g
gephi_tools (Unix, OSX) tools for tranforming and exporting cosine matrices into gephi networks
 
i
intialise (Unix, OSX) Set up a scraping run
 
m
model_training (Unix, OSX) train word2vec and doc2vec models using documentIterator
MunchSpider (Unix, OSX) Scrapy spider object for collecting metadata from publisher webpages

scrapingtools (Unix, OSX) Function library for use in Cherry module scraping

SeekSpider (Unix, OSX) Scrapy spider object for crawling websites to extract dois
